branchCategory.name: MHL
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Gripper series 90-MHL and 91-MHL are designed for applications  that require a wide travel range of gripper fingers. 90-MHL is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MHL includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications. The MHL is ideal for gripping many different sized parts. Finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism.  The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with large holding force.  </p>

branchItem.name: 90/91-MHL2, Air Gripper, Parallel Style, Wide Opening
branchItem.description: <p>Air Gripper series 90-MHL and 91-MHL are designed for applications&nbsp; that require a wide travel range of gripper fingers. 90-MHL is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MHL includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40&deg;C) applications. The MHL is ideal for gripping many different sized parts. Finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism.&nbsp; The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with large holding force.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
